targets.expr: (sum(rate(http_requests_total{status_code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval])) or on() vector(0)) / (sum(rate(http_requests_total[$__rate_interval])) > 0 or on() vector(1))

(sum(rate(mcp_tool_call_success_total[$__rate_interval])) or on() vector(0)) / ((sum(rate(mcp_tool_call_success_total[$__rate_interval])) + sum(rate(mcp_tool_call_failures_total[$__rate_interval]))) > 0 or on() vector(1)) * 100
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le, server_name) (rate(mcp_tool_call_latency_seconds_bucket[$__rate_interval]))) or on() vector(0)
(sum(rate(sophosic_sophia_tool_duration_seconds_sum[$__rate_interval])) / (sum(rate(sophosic_sophia_tool_duration_seconds_count[$__rate_interval])) > 0 or on() vector(1))) or on() vector(0)
(sum(rate(sophosic_sophia_tool_calls_total{status="error"}[$__rate_interval])) or on() vector(0)) / ((sum(rate(sophosic_sophia_tool_calls_total[$__rate_interval]))) > 0 or on() vector(1)) * 100
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le, tool_name) (rate(sophosic_sophia_tool_duration_seconds_bucket[$__rate_interval]))) or on() vector(0)
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le) (rate(sophosic_embedding_task_duration_seconds_bucket[$__rate_interval]))) or on() vector(0)
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le) (rate(sophosic_db_query_duration_seconds_bucket[$__rate_interval]))) or on() vector(0)
(sum(rate(sophosic_db_queries_total{status="error"}[$__rate_interval])) or on() vector(0)) / (sum(rate(sophosic_db_queries_total[$__rate_interval])) > 0 or on() vector(1))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le) (rate(sophosic_external_api_request_duration_seconds_bucket[$__rate_interval]))) or on() vector(0)
(sum(rate(sophosic_external_api_errors_total[$__rate_interval])) or on() vector(0)) / (sum(rate(sophosic_external_api_requests_total[$__rate_interval])) > 0 or on() vector(1))
